title: The House of Kuragin
description: A swirling novel of danger and passion in Russia under the Czar. Stunning,swashbuckling, romantic!Sweeping from the gambling hells of St. Petersburgto the opulent ballrooms of Russian country estates, here is a powerful taleof desire and betrayal woven from the glittering fabric of pre-RevolutionaryRussian life protagonized by the young Amarylis.
author: Constance Heaven
